title: Conditions (if / else)
concept: This level teaches decision making in C using if, else if and else. Focus on correct relational operators (>, <, ==, !=, >=, <=) and proper formatting of output WITHOUT extra words or spaces. Pay attention to uppercase/lowercase in print statements.

challenges.title: Positive or Negative
challenges.description: Read an integer and print Positive if number > 0, Negative if number < 0, and Zero otherwise.

challenges.title: Even or Odd
challenges.description: Print Even if the number is divisible by 2 else print Odd.

challenges.title: Maximum of Two
challenges.description: Read two integers and print the bigger one.

challenges.title: Minimum of Three
challenges.description: Read three integers and print the smallest.

challenges.title: Absolute Value
challenges.description: Print the absolute value of the integer.

challenges.title: Divisible by 5 and 11
challenges.description: Print Yes if the number is divisible by BOTH 5 and 11 else print No.

challenges.title: Leap Year
challenges.description: Print Yes if the year is a leap year else print No.

challenges.title: Grade Calculator
challenges.description: Given percentage marks, print the grade: A if >=90, B if >=75, C if >=60, D if >=40 else Fail.

challenges.title: Character Type
challenges.description: Print Uppercase if A–Z, Lowercase if a–z, Digit if 0–9 else Symbol.

challenges.title: Menu Driven Operation
challenges.description: Input: 2 numbers and an operator (+, -, *, /). Perform the operation and print the result.
